channel.title: The Garden of Chaos: Fantasy Strike Events
channel.description: Events happening in Fantasy Strike, compiled by the Garden of Chaos.

image.title: The Garden of Chaos: Fantays Strike Events

item.title: Garden of Chaos Big Update Tournament
item.description: A Garden of Chaos tournament to celebrate the big update, in the Teams style - one team will play the original characters of Fantasy Strike, one team will play the new ones! To be held shortly after the big update (whenever that happens) at 20:00 UTC / 21:00 BST / 16:00 PDT / 15:00 EDT https://challonge.com/FSGardenofChaosUpdate

item.title: TPK Weekly Fantasy Strike Tournament #33
item.description: TPK Esports - Fantasy Strike Weekly Tournament #33! Saturday the 4th of July 2020 at 20:00 UTC / 21:00 BST / 16:00 PDT / 15:00 EDT https://challonge.com/TPKEsportsFSWeekly33

item.title: Garden of Chaos 6
item.description: The sixth Garden of Chaos tournament, in the Many and the Few style! To be held on Thursday the 2nd of July 2020 at 20:00 UTC / 21:00 BST / 16:00 PDT / 15:00 EDT https://challonge.com/FSGardenofChaos6

item.title: Monday Night Strike
item.description: Monday Night Strike, a commentary stream run by Remy AKA Agoners - at 19:00 UTC / 20:00 BST / 12:00 PDT / 15:00 EDT, join the casual and ranked queues for a chance that your match will be spectated and commentated on stream! https://twitch.tv/agoners

item.title: Rank Up Night
item.description: Rank Up Night, a time when everyone comes online in the ranked queue, sometimes streamed by Leontes - at around 02:00 UTC / 03:00 BST / 19:00 PDT / 22:00 EDT

item.title: Garden of Chaos B
item.description: The fifth weekly Garden of Chaos tournament, in the Oops, All Vals! style (a modification of Teams where all players use Valerie)! To be held on Thursday the 25th of June 2020 at 20:00 UTC / 21:00 BST / 16:00 PDT / 15:00 EDT (yes, this has already happened as of this RSS feed being made, but ah well :D ) https://challonge.com/FSGardenofChaos5

item.title: Garden of the 4saken
item.description: The fourth weekly Garden of Chaos tournament, in the Cursed, AKA Choose Your Enemy, AKA Vice Versus style! To be held on Thursday the 11th of June 2020 at 20:00 UTC / 21:00 BST / 16:00 PDT / 15:00 EDT (yes, this has already happened as of this RSS feed being made, but ah well :D ) https://challonge.com/FSGardenofChaos4

item.title: Garden of Chaos 3
item.description: The third weekly Garden of Chaos tournament, in the Mirror Mayhem style! To be held on Thursday the 4th of June 2020 at 20:00 UTC / 21:00 BST / 16:00 PDT / 15:00 EDT (yes, this has already happened as of this RSS feed being made, but ah well :D ) https://challonge.com/FSGardenofChaos3

item.title: Garden of Chaos 2
item.description: The second weekly Garden of Chaos tournament, in the Democracy style! To be held on Thursday the 28th of May 2020 at 20:00 UTC / 21:00 BST / 16:00 PDT / 15:00 EDT (yes, this has already happened as of this RSS feed being made, but ah well :D ) https://challonge.com/FSGardenofChaos2

item.title: Garden of Chaos 1
item.description: The first weekly Garden of Chaos tournament, in the Roll the Dice style! To be held on Thursday the 21st of May 2020 at 20:00 UTC / 21:00 BST / 16:00 PDT / 15:00 EDT (yes, this has already happened as of this RSS feed being made, but ah well :D ) https://challonge.com/FSGardenofChaos1
